markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Alate Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1837)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Alate ants are no less devoted and powerful than red guard ants, but they are slightly smaller in size and have delicate wings that bear them aloft. Alate ants secrete pheromones that addle the minds of the hive's enemies. A hive deploys alate ants as both defenders from aerial threats and as advance scouts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Alate Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1837)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 72</row>

**Perception** +28; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +8

**Con** +6

**Int** -1

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 295

**Darting Flight** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirement** The alate ant is flying; **Trigger** The ant is targeted with  an attack by an attacker it can see; **Effect** The ant gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +32 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d8+10 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d4+10 piercing plus red ant venom

**Pheromone Spray** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The alate ant sprays a cloud of pheromones in a 15-foot cone. Non-ant creatures in the cone must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1d4 rounds (1 minute on a critical failure). It can't use Pheromone Spray again for 1d4 rounds.

**Frenzy** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** Once per day; **Effect** The alate ant enters a state of jittery agitation. It becomes [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 3 rounds and can use the extra action only to [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) or Strike.

**Pack Attack**   The alate ant deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to any creature within reach of at least two of the ant's allies.

**Red Ant Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) While a creature is enfeebled from this poison, it is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (this confusion is an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), and [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect). **Saving Throw** DC 37 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-304" />
name: Alate Ant
